name: minions-oss-quality-workspace
description: Linting rules, test coverage targets, usability checklists, and release gates
author: Mehdi Nabhani <mehdi@the-mehdi.com> (https://the-mehdi.com)

scripts.build: pnpm --filter @minions-oss-quality/sdk run build && pnpm --filter @minions-oss-quality/cli run build && pnpm --filter @minions-oss-quality/docs run build && pnpm --filter @minions-oss-quality/blog run build && pnpm --filter @minions-oss-quality/web run build
scripts.deploy:blog: pnpm --filter @minions-oss-quality/blog run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/blog/dist --prod
scripts.deploy:docs: pnpm --filter @minions-oss-quality/docs run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/docs/dist --prod
scripts.deploy:web: pnpm --filter @minions-oss-quality/web run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/web/dist --prod
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter @minions-oss-quality/sdk run build && pnpm --filter @minions-oss-quality/sdk run lint && pnpm --filter @minions-oss-quality/cli run lint
